text: Aur hum ney bani israeel ko darya kay paar utaar diya. Pus unn logon ka aik qom per guzar hua jo apney chand button say lagay bethay thay kehney lagay aey musa! Humaray liye bhi aik mabood aisa hi muqarrar ker dijiye! Jaisay inn kay yeh mabood hain. Aap ney farmaya kay waqaee tum logon mein bari jahalat hai
